title: Windmill Whispers
text_nl: De windmolen draait sneller dan de roddels.
text_en: The windmill spins faster than the gossip.

title: Pocket of Secrets
text_nl: Er zitten meer geheimen in deze zak dan in de stad.
text_en: There are more secrets in this pocket than in the town.

title: Quiet Corner
text_nl: In de stille hoek worden de luidste verhalen gefluisterd.
text_en: In the quiet corner, the loudest stories get whispered.
